LockIn

Terms of Service

Acceptance of Terms

By using LockIn, you agree to these terms. If you don't agree, please don't use the service.

Description of Service

LockIn is a focus timer application designed to help you maintain concentration during work sessions. The service includes:

  • Timed focus sessions (25, 50, 90 minutes)
  • Psychological quit friction to encourage completion
  • Optional brown noise audio
  • Local session history

Free vs Paid Features

Basic features are available for free. Pro features (90-minute sessions, volume control) require a paid subscription or lifetime purchase.

Payments & Refunds

Payments are processed securely through Stripe. Monthly subscriptions can be cancelled at any time. Lifetime purchases are non-refundable after 14 days.

User Conduct

You agree to use LockIn only for its intended purpose of focus and productivity. Don't attempt to bypass payment systems or abuse the service.

Disclaimer

LockIn is provided "as is" without warranties. We're not responsible for any productivity gains or losses, missed deadlines, or other outcomes.

Changes to Terms

We may update these terms. Continued use of LockIn constitutes acceptance of updated terms.

Contact
